verses.verse: Now in the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia, <S%H6539><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%H3615><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> stirred <S%H5782><s%> up the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia, <S%H6539><s%> that he made a proclamation <S%H5674><s%> <S%H6963><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> his kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and put it also <S%H1571><s%> in writing, <S%H4385><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia, <S%H6539><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> me all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> and he has charged <S%H6485><s%> me to build <S%H1129><s%> him an house <S%H1004><s%> at Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is there among you of all <S%H3605><s%> his people? <S%H5971><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> be with him, and let him go <S%H5927><s%> up to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> (he is the God, <S%H430><s%>) which <S%H834><s%> is in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And whoever <S%H3605><s%> remains <S%H7604><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he sojournes, <S%H1481><s%> let the men <S%H582><s%> of his place <S%H4725><s%> help <S%H5375><s%> him with silver, <S%H3701><s%> and with gold, <S%H2091><s%> and with goods, <S%H7399><s%> and with beasts, <S%H929><s%> beside <S%H5973><s%> the freewill <S%H5071><s%> offering for the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> that is in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Then rose <S%H6965><s%> up the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> them whose <S%H853><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had raised, <S%H5782><s%> to go <S%H5927><s%> up to build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> they that were about <S%H5439><s%> them strengthened <S%H2388><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> with vessels <S%H3627><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> with gold, <S%H2091><s%> with goods, <S%H7399><s%> and with beasts, <S%H929><s%> and with precious <S%H4030><s%> things, beside <S%H905><s%> <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that was willingly <S%H5068><s%> offered.

Also Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> had brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and had put <S%H5414><s%> them in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his gods; <S%H430><s%>

Even those did Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Mithredath <S%H4990><s%> the treasurer, <S%H1489><s%> and numbered <S%H5608><s%> them to Sheshbazzar, <S%H8339><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

And this <S%H428><s%> is the number <S%H4557><s%> of them: thirty <S%H7970><s%> chargers <S%H105><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> chargers <S%H105><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> knives, <S%H4252><s%>

Thirty <S%H7970><s%> basins <S%H3713><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> basins <S%H3713><s%> of a second <S%H4932><s%> sort four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten, <S%H6235><s%> and other <S%H312><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> a thousand. <S%H505><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and of silver <S%H3701><s%> were five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> these did Sheshbazzar <S%H8339><s%> bring <S%H5927><s%> up with them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%> that were brought <S%H5927><s%> up from Babylon <S%H894><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
